data.text: @adriandkelly @ClassicsSt That would potentially be the dog's breakfast...!

@ClassicsSt I think in my own connection of that line in ‘The Odd Boy’ by The Bonzo Dog Dooh Dah Band: Simon ‘is still a bit snotty and I don’t think he ought to be outside with the rougher kind of boy’.
@ClassicsSt Poppit has grown 😳🥺 I miss her https://t.co/mSjryALHYb
@SimonPulleyn Get well soon, Simon! Day 4 now and things seem to be easing off.
